main.bio: Hey! Call me Sree, I'm a Salesforce consultant turned aspiring Full Stack developer. I am currently building two full-stack hobbyist projects. Please check them in my Works
main.name: Sree Charan Shatdarsanam
main.occupation: I am Salesforce.com Developer and Consultant
main.bio: Technology Consultant, Developer with 9 years of combined firm experience in Deloitte Salesforce practice mainly in LSHC and TMT domains. Skilled in Salesforce declarative configuration and custom development (Apex, Aura, LWC) to address complex client challenges. Experienced onshore Consultant, Senior Developer, and Deployment Support resource for Sales Cloud and Community Cloud projects.  Adept at Agile frameworks, ensuring efficient delivery, collaboration, and iterative improvement across multiple client engagements. Driven to expand Salesforce design expertise and leverage no-code solutions to streamline implementations and optimize client outcomes.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details or just have a conversation on ReactJS or anything else :)

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

description.positions: Graduate Assistant at Marketing Department | Member of Tableau User Group Steering Committee

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Developed custom wrappers for platform’s reusable UI library-base by leveraging Google Material-UI, ReactJS. Led the initiative of converting platform’s icon-base to a reusable node package for efficient maintenance and upgrades. Leveraged Azure DevOps to document and fine-grain value-added user stories related to platform's user interface

work.title: Pre-Sales Intern
work.description: Performed competitive analysis, researched trends on various pricing solutions and designed capability maps. Had constant interaction with the Solutions head, Prepared Pre-Sales content on Pricing solutions, Marketing Strategy and ERP Data pre-prep. Continuing to develop more awareness about KPIs that influence software sales!

work.title: Senior Salesforce Developer and Consultant
work.description: Digital Knowledge Sharing Contributor (1200 outreach on the floor) for few topics. Developed a cool mix of experience in Salesforce development and administration, CRM Tech-Consulting. Co-Lead a firm sponsored CSR Teaching initiative for two years

projects.title: MERN Stack YouTube Clone- WIP
projects.category: Youtube Web App Clone built with React, Context API

projects.title: MERN Stack Amazon Clone WIP
projects.category: Amazon Clone built with MERN (Firebase, ReactJS, NodeJS)

articles.title: ReactJS - A beginner's perspective on web based development
articles.category: Part-1 of series of introductory articles on this awesome library!

testimonials.text: Recent Testimonial: Hey Sree. It was an absolute pleasure working with you and watching you grow during your internship. I know you didn't get to do a lot of application development or GQL work but you made significant contributions to the platform that were highly critical to our success. Your go getting attitude, thirst for knowledge, and optimism will get you super far in your career.
